name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.mover.moverThreads
description: Configure the balancer's mover thread pool size.

name: hadoop.http.cross-origin.max-age
description:
The number of seconds a pre-flighted request can be cached
    for web services needing cross-origin (CORS) support.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.container.log.limit.kb
description:
The maximum size of the MRAppMaster attempt container logs in KB.
    0 disables the cap.

name: file.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: mapreduce.map.maxattempts
description:
Expert: The maximum number of attempts per map task.
  In other words, framework will try to execute a map task these many number
  of times before giving up on it.

name: dfs.batched.ls.limit
description:
Limit the number of paths that can be listed in a single batched
    listing call. printed by ls. If less or equal to
    zero, at most DFS_LIST_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be printed.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make to establish
               a server connection.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.
